alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 07 at 4:08AM EST until January 07 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the eastern Albemarle, Croatan, and Roanoke Sounds, Kitty Hawk Bay, and adjacent tidal creeks, eastern Pamlico Sound, and adjacent tidal creeks, and Ocracoke Island. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Up to 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in a low threat of property damage. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. Soundside flooding could reach NC 12 on Hatteras Island, inundating portions of the road. Additionally, portions of roads around downtown Manteo and Colington Island could be inundated. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Coast Guard Hatteras NC MLLW Categories - Minor 2.5 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 4.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 07/09 AM 2.8 1.6 2.1 3-4 Minor 08/12 AM 1.8 0.6 0.9 2-3 None 08/10 AM 1.4 0.2 0.7 2 None 09/01 AM 1.1 -0.1 0.2 1 None 09/01 PM 1.0 -0.2 0.2 1 None 10/01 AM 1.1 -0.1 0.3 2 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island
